Spanish.text: El gato duerme en la casa.
Spanish.translation: The cat sleeps in the house.
Spanish.pronounce: el gah-toh dwehr-meh en lah kah-sah

Spanish.text: El hombre alto lee un libro.
Spanish.translation: The tall man reads a book.
Spanish.pronounce: el ohm-breh al-toh leh-eh un lee-broh

Spanish.translation: I am reading an interesting book.

Spanish.text: Voy a correr en el parque.
Spanish.translation: I am going to run in the park.
Spanish.pronounce: voy ah koh-rehr en el par-keh

Spanish.text: Me gusta hablar con mis amigos.
Spanish.translation: I like to talk with my friends.
Spanish.pronounce: meh goo-stah ah-blar kon mees ah-mee-gos

Spanish.translation: We are going to eat together.

Spanish.text: Nos gusta caminar en la playa.
Spanish.translation: We like to walk on the beach.
Spanish.pronounce: nos goo-stah kah-mee-nar en lah plah-yah

Spanish.text: Mi hermana estudia en la escuela.
Spanish.translation: My sister studies at the school.
Spanish.pronounce: mee ehr-mah-nah es-too-dyah en lah es-kweh-lah

Spanish.text: La escuela está en la ciudad.
Spanish.translation: The school is in the city.
Spanish.pronounce: lah es-kweh-lah es-tah en lah syoo-dad

Spanish.translation: I need to write a letter.

Spanish.text: Mi padre trabaja todo el día.
Spanish.pronounce: mee pah-dreh tra-bah-hah toh-doh el dee-ah

Spanish.text: La familia come junta los domingos.
Spanish.translation: The family eats together on Sundays.
Spanish.pronounce: lah fah-mee-lee-ah koh-meh hoon-tah los doh-meen-gos

Spanish.text: Me gusta leer por la noche.
Spanish.translation: I like to read at night.
Spanish.pronounce: meh goo-stah leh-ehr por lah noh-cheh

Spanish.translation: I don't have time for that.

Spanish.text: El niño pequeño juega en el parque.
Spanish.translation: The small child plays in the park.
Spanish.pronounce: el nee-nyoh peh-keh-nyoh hoo-eh-gah en el par-keh

Spanish.text: La casa pequeña tiene dos habitaciones.
Spanish.translation: The small house has two rooms.
Spanish.pronounce: lah kah-sah peh-keh-nyoh tee-eh-neh dos ah-bee-ta-syoh-nes

Spanish.text: Un coche pequeño está en la calle.
Spanish.translation: A small car is on the street.
Spanish.pronounce: un koh-cheh peh-keh-nyoh es-tah en lah kah-yeh
